snippet: The lawyer for the lead producer of the Broadway musical, which collapsed after the reported death of a mysterious investor, said on Sunday that the investor and three others who were brought in never existed.
abstract: The lawyer for the lead producer of the Broadway musical, which collapsed after the reported death of a mysterious investor, said on Sunday that the investor and three others who were brought in never existed.

byline.original: By WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM and PATRICK HEALY

headline.main: Inquiry Finds That Four 'Rebecca' Investors Did Not Exist
headline.print_headline: 4 ‘Rebecca’ Investors Were Intermediary’s Fabrications, Inquiry Finds
